metadata.title: CVE-2020-16126 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An Ubuntu-specific modification to AccountsService in versions before0.6.55-0ubuntu13.2, among other earlier versions, improperly dropped theruid, allowing untrusted users to send signals to AccountService, thusstopping it from handling D-Bus messages in a timely fashion.

criterions.comment: accountsservice: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
